g.text: Foundational perspective view with tee at bottom, proper 3D
arcs, terrain undulations, and two hole examples (Convergent
Path & Dogleg). Shows 4 terrain layers with confidence mapping.

g.text: Side-by-side comparison of four prompting scenarios: The
Convergent, The Explorer, The Precision, The Creative. Each
with unique terrain profiles and iteration patterns.

g.text: ‚Ä¢ 10 shot archetypes including Putter, Driver, Wedge, Curve, Recovery, Drop, Layup, Punch, Chip

‚Ä¢ Hazard zones (water/dependency hell, sand/technical debt, rough/unclear requirements)

ESSENTIAL for 40-100+ shot development workflows and team scorecarding
